author: atscott
message: docs: release notes for the v11.0.8 release (#40392)

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,15 @@ + +## 11.0.8 (2021-01-11) + + +### Bug Fixes + +* **core:** memory leak if view container host view is destroyed while view ref is not ([#40219](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/40219)) ([f691e85](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/f691e85)), closes [#38648](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/38648) +* **forms:** handle standalone `
` tag correctly in `NgControlStatusGroup` directive ([#40344](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/40344)) ([b3f322f](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/b3f322f)), closes [#38391](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/38391) +* **router:** Remove usage of `Object.values` to avoid the need for a polyfill ([#40370](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/40370)) ([c44dd84](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/c44dd84)) + + + ## 11.0.7 (2021-01-07)
